mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_sessions ( SESSION_ID, MEM_ID, LOGIN_TIME, LOGOUT_TIME) VALUES ( user_sessions_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE user_sessions SET LOGOUT_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND LOGOUT_TIME IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, AVG(EXTRACT(DAY FROM SESSION_DURATION) * 86400 + EXTRACT(HOUR FROM SESSION_DURATION) * 3600 + EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM SESSION_DURATION) * 60 + EXTRACT(SECOND FROM SESSION_DURATION)) AS AVG_SESSION_DURATION FROM user_sessions WHERE session_duration IS NOT NULL GROUP BY MEM_ID
